languages.text: После смерти порождает газовое облако, которое рассеется через 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Газ восстанавливает союзникам павшего существа 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, если они проводят в облаке 1 раунд.
languages.original_text: Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.

languages.text: Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.
languages.original_text: После смерти порождает газовое облако, которое рассеется через 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Газ восстанавливает союзникам павшего существа 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, если они проводят в облаке 1 раунд.

traits.locale_text: Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 rounds. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum wounds if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.

Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.

Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.

languages.text: Al morir, genera una nube de gas que se disipa después de 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. El gas cura a los aliados de la criatura caída un 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas si permanecen en la nube durante 1 asalto.
languages.original_text: Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Al morir, genera una nube de gas que se disipa después de 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. El gas cura a los aliados de la criatura caída un 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas si permanecen en la nube durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: 死亡时生成一团气体云雾，云雾会在两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}后消散。如果此生物的盟友在云雾中停留一轮，则会恢复最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的50%。
languages.original_text: Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 死亡时生成一团气体云雾，云雾会在两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}后消散。如果此生物的盟友在云雾中停留一轮，则会恢复最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的50%。

languages.text: 死亡すると、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}後に消失するガス雲を発生させる。死んだ生物の味方が1ラウンドの間そのガスの中にいると最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の50%を回復させる。
languages.original_text: Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 死亡すると、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}後に消失するガス雲を発生させる。死んだ生物の味方が1ラウンドの間そのガスの中にいると最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の50%を回復させる。

languages.text: Beim Tod wird eine Gaswolke erzeugt, die sich nach 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} auflöst. Das Gas heilt bei Verbündeten der gefallenen Kreatur 50 % ihrer maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, wenn sie 1 Runde lang in der Wolke bleiben.
languages.original_text: Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Beim Tod wird eine Gaswolke erzeugt, die sich nach 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} auflöst. Das Gas heilt Verbündete der gefallenen Kreatur um 50% ihrer maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, wenn sie 1 Runde lang in der Wolke bleiben.

languages.text: En mourant, la créature produit un nuage de gaz qui se dissipe au bout de 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Ce gaz soigne les alliés de cette créature à hauteur de 50 % de leur réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum s'ils restent dans le nuage pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text: Upon death, spawns a gas cloud that will dissipate after 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. The gas heals allies of the fallen creature for 50% of their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} if they stay in the cloud for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: En mourant, la créature produit un nuage de gaz qui se dissipe au bout de 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Ce gaz soigne les alliés de cette créature à hauteur de 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum s'ils restent dans le nuage pendant 1 round.
